articles.author: Vivian Ho
articles.title: ‘American Idol’ music supervisor and husband shot dead in L.A. home - The Washington Post
articles.description: Robin Kaye and her husband, Thomas Deluca, were killed when they walked in on an intruder, police said. A 22-year-old suspect, Raymond Boodarian, has been arrested.
articles.content:
A 22-year-old suspect has been arrested in connection with the deaths of an American Idol music supervisor and her husband, who were found fatally shot in their Los Angeles home.

articles.author: Nicole Markus
articles.title: Americans were following Trump's big legislative win closely — and they say they don't support it - Politico
articles.description: Though Americans have not yet seen the effects of the bill, just 29 percent believe it will help the economy.
articles.content:
The high initial disapproval of the law could be a warning sign for Republicans in the midterms, as the GOP faces a fierce fight to maintain their narrow majorities in Congress.
